commands.go to x:%1 y:%2: e oho ki te a x: %1 y: %2
commands.glide %1 secs to x:%2 y:%3: haka nini ki te %1 piere ki te x:%2 y: %3
commands.glide %1 secs to %2: haka nini hai %1 piere ki te %2
commands.set x to %1: ka vaʾai ki te x te mau %1
commands.set y to %1: ka vaʾai ki te a e ki te %1
commands.switch costume to %1: ka kamiare te diseño ki te %1
commands.switch backdrop to %1: ka kamiare te tuʾa nui ki te %1
commands.switch backdrop to %1 and wait: kamiare te tuʾa nui ki te %1 e ka tiaki
commands.change size by %1: ka kamiare te nui nui hai %1
commands.set size to %1%: haka noho te nui nui ki te %1 %
commands.clear sound effects: haka kore te  efecto  o te pakeke
commands.play drum %1 for %2 beats: haka taŋi te tampuru %1 Aa rote %2 hora
commands.play note %1 for %2 beats: haka taŋi te nota %1 a rote %2 hora
commands.set instrument to %1: haka tano te meʾe mo haka taŋi ki te %1
commands.change volume by %1: ka kamiare te reʾo ki te %1
commands.set tempo to %1: ka vaʾai te tempo ki te mau %1
commands.set pen color to %1: haka tano te kiea o te pentara ko te %1
commands.change pen color by %1: ka kamiare te kiea o te pentara por %1
commands.change pen shade by %1: ka kamiare te kohu o te pentara ki te %1
commands.set pen shade to %1: haka tano te kohu o te pentara ki te %1
commands.change pen size by %1: ka kamiare te nui nui o te pentara ki te %1
commands.set pen size to %1: haka tano te nui nui o te pentara ki te %1
commands.when @greenFlag clicked: ki āŋa te clic i te @greenFlag
commands.when this sprite clicked: ki āŋa te clic i te meʾe nei
commands.when stage clicked: mo ŋatu te clic i te ahu
commands.when backdrop switches to %1: ki kamiare te tuʾa nui ki te %1
commands.create clone of %1: e aŋa te ko tu meʾe a o te %1
commands.set video transparency to %1%: haka tano te maeha o te teata ki te %1
commands.when video motion > %1: a he te makenu o te teata %1
commands.reset timer: e haʾamata haka ʾou te cronómetro
commands.set %1 to %2: e vaʾai ki te %1 te mau %2
commands.if on edge, bounce: ana hahine ki te titi, ka rere rere
commands.insert %1 at %2 of %3: e hahaʾo te %1 ki te %2 o te %3
commands.replace item %1 of %2 with %3: ka hahaʾo te rua meʾe %1 o te %2 hai %3
commands.show list %1: haka tikeʾa te parau o te meʾe %1
commands.mouse x: he kona noho x o te kioʾe
commands.mouse y: he kona noho y o te kioʾe
commands.set drag mode %1: haka titika te modo makenu ki te %1
commands.item # of %1 in %2: # o te meʾe he %1 i te %2
commands.when distance %1 %2: a he te roa haka tano %1 %2
commands.set light color to %1: haka tano te peni o te morī ki te %1
commands.play note %1 for %2 seconds: ka haka taŋi%1 hai hora %2 piere

soundEffects: haka iri te reʾo o a te maui o a te mataʾu
osis: te tahi programa i te sprite
name: Rapa Nui
